price: 70. Then, verily, We know best those who are most worthy of being burnt therein.
arabic: ثُمَّ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: thumma lanaḥnu aʿlamu bi-alladhīna hum awlā bihā ṣiliyyan
